name: metatdenovo-assembly
title: Metatranscriptome Assembly & Annotation (nf-core/metatdenovo)
description: De novo assembly and annotation of metatranscriptomic or metagenomic data. Supports prokaryotic, eukaryotic, and viral sequences with comprehensive functional and taxonomic annotation.
content:
Metatranscriptome Assembly & Annotation

The nf-core/metatdenovo pipeline performs de novo assembly and comprehensive annotation of metatranscriptomic and metagenomic data from microbial communities.

Scientific Applications

  • Microbiome Function: Characterize active genes in communities
  • Novel Gene Discovery: Find new enzymes and metabolic pathways
  • Host-Microbe Interactions: Study microbial responses
  • Environmental Microbiology: Study unculturable organisms
  • Biotechnology: Discover novel enzymes and proteins
  • Disease Mechanisms: Link microbiome activity to disease

Pipeline Features

  • Read Quality Control: FastQC, Fastp trimming
  • De novo Assembly: RNAspades (metatranscriptomes) or Megahit (metagenomes)
  • ORF Prediction: TransDecoder, Prokka, or Prodigal
  • Gene Quantification: Salmon or Kallisto abundance estimation
  • Functional Annotation: KEGG, COG, Pfam databases
  • Taxonomic Classification: Kraken2 or DIAMOND
  • Quality Filtering: Optional normalization and filtering

Input Requirements

CSV samplesheet:

  • sample: Sample identifier
  • fastq_1: Forward reads
  • fastq_2: Reverse reads (if paired-end)

Supports both RNA-seq and DNA-seq data.

Key Outputs

  • Assembled Contigs: De novo assembled sequences
  • ORF Predictions: Predicted protein-coding genes
  • Gene Quantification: Expression/abundance matrices
  • Functional Annotations: KEGG pathways, COG categories
  • Taxonomic Assignments: Species-level classifications
  • QC Reports: MultiQC comprehensive summary

Perfect for: Microbiome researchers • Environmental microbiologists • Metagenomics • Novel gene discovery
